front.title: DNS Redirect Use by Service Providers

abstract.t: The objective of this document is to describe the design of so-calledDNS Redirect services deployed today by Internet Service Providers(ISPs), DNS Application Service Providers (ASPs), and otherorganizations providing so-called DNS Redirect services via theirrecursive DNS servers, as well as to describe the recommendedpractices regarding relating to DNS redirect. This documentspecifically and narrowly addresses those cases where DNS Redirect isbeing utilized to provide a web error redirect service to end users,and describes the critical implications for DNS Redirect when DNSSECis deployed.
